author: wrowe
msg: Fix faux-autoconfish magic for Solaris sed (no trusty \| operator) and add

author: rgrabowski
msg: Added CreateCommand(IMappedStatement, parameterObject) method to make it easier to create a parameter populated IDbCommand without passing it through the execution and result mapping phases. This method is not a member of the IPreparedCommand interface because it is not a part of the normal execution/result lifecycle. It may be useful in custom execution or testing scenarios.

author: xuhaihong
msg: GERONIMO-4070 Plugin installer fails to install after previous attempt of a plugin has failed. (Patch from Shawn Jiang)
